section.name: Set up your project
section.p: To use this plugin in your project, follow two steps:

ol.li: Make sure that the groupId of your project matches to the Maven convention (org.jvnet.project or a package name you control.)
Make sure to set maven.javanet.project property to your java.net project name.

Make sure that project.xml has the right <repository>/<connection> parameter, such as scm:cvs:pserver:guest@cvs.dev.java.net:/cvs:${maven.javanet.project} or scm:svn:https://guest@svn.dev.java.net/svn/${maven.javanet.project}. This plugin uses this setting to determine if the project is CVS-based or Subversion-based.
